title: 关于升级1.8 uuid转化的问题
author: cheng000
txt_content:
1.7X的用户数据是使用username存储的 1.8是UUID
用1.8的服务端启动服务器的时候，会提示 开始转化uuid 
但是过不了多久就出现报错，无法转化
报错信息：
[01:28:23] [Server thread/INFO]: **** Beginning UUID conversion, this may take A LONG time ****
[01:29:09] [Server thread/WARN]: Could not lookup user uuid for brave
com.mojang.authlib.exceptions.AuthenticationUnavailableException: Cannot contact authentication server
        at com.mojang.authlib.yggdrasil.YggdrasilAuthenticationService.makeRequest(YggdrasilAuthenticationService.java:71) ~[spigot-1.8.7.jar:git-Spigot-f94fe8f-d27e6d0]
        at com.mojang.authlib.yggdrasil.YggdrasilGameProfileRepository.findProfilesByNames(YggdrasilGameProfileRepository.java:50) [spigot-1.8.7.jar:git-Spigot-f94fe8f-d27e6d0]
        at net.minecraft.server.v1_8_R3.NameReferencingFileConverter.a(NameReferencingFileConverter.java:67) [spigot-1.8.7.jar:git-Spigot-f94fe8f-d27e6d0]
        at net.minecraft.server.v1_8_R3.NameReferencingFileConverter.a(NameReferencingFileConverter.java:405) [spigot-1.8.7.jar:git-Spigot-f94fe8f-d27e6d0]

        at net.minecraft.server.v1_8_R3.MinecraftServer.run(MinecraftServer.java:524) [spigot-1.8.7.jar:git-Spigot-f94fe8f-d27e6d0]
        at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) [?:1.7.0_76]
Caused by: java.net.SocketTimeoutException: connect timed out

请教各位有升级1.8经验的同学.是怎么搞得
